sentences.en: Could not this very Socratic way be  a sign of collapse, exhaustion, sickness, and the dissolution of the  anarchic instinct?
sentences.cn: 这个非常苏格拉底式的方法不能是无法无天的天性的崩塌、耗尽、疾患和解体的一个信号？

sentences.en: He began to have blinding headaches and to show signs of exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 他开始隐隐觉得头痛,并显出精疲力竭的影响.

sentences.en: He felt as if he would faint from exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 他感到精疲力尽得快要晕过去了.

sentences.en: His exhaustion was obvious when he fell asleep standing.
sentences.cn: 他站着睡着了,显然是太累了.

sentences.en: I was in a state of exhaustion after the long journey.
sentences.cn: 这次长途旅行后我感到精疲力竭.

sentences.en: I was suffering from acute sunstroke, starvation and exhaustion.
Lack of exercise can lead to feelings of depression and exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 缺乏锻炼会导致抑郁和疲劳。

sentences.en: Maintenance snow crews were nearing exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 雪天维修人员快被拖垮了.

sentences.en: Many runners were suffering from heat exhaustion (= when you become tired and ill because you are too hot ).
sentences.cn: 许多赛跑运动员都出现了热衰竭。

sentences.en: Royal jelly is effective in treating nervous exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 蜂皇精治神经衰弱很有效.

sentences.en: She slept the sleep of exhaustion.
She'd flung herself in a pose of melodramatic exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 她一下子摆出一副筋疲力尽的夸张姿势。

sentences.en: Sheer exhaustion forced him to give up.
Staff say he is suffering from exhaustion.
The exhaustion hit her then, closely followed by a rush of self - pity.
sentences.cn: 这时她劳累已极; 不由地自怜起来.

sentences.en: Then she felt herself go into a kind of stupor of exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 不久,她只感到陷入一种精疲力竭的麻木状态.

sentences.en: They were in a state of exhaustion after climbing the mountain.
sentences.cn: 他们爬山以后筋疲力尽了.

sentences.en: Timothy was crying, mostly from exhaustion, and his nose was running.
sentences.cn: 由于太累了，蒂莫西哭的一把鼻涕一把泪。

sentences.en: We can define burnout as exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把burnout (燃尽)解释为 exhaustion (耗尽)。
